attributes.action: Raise a public inquiry into the health effects of 5G networks
attributes.additional_details:
According to:
https://ehtrust.org/scientific-research-on-5g-and-health/

“Researchers with the Ramazzini Institute (RI) performed a lifetime study of lab animals exposed to allowable limits from cell towers of RFR radiation.  The rats developed increased cancers- schwannoma of the heart in male rats, confirming the US National Toxicology Program study using cell phone radiofrequency (RF) radiation, who also found unusual cancers such as - schwannoma of the heart in male rats.
attributes.background: 5G has been created for machine efficiency, offering low-latency, high-efficiency data transfer. 5G is said to reduce  the 4G fifty-millisecond signal/data transfer delay, to a one-millisecond delay, which is undetectable and arguably uninterrupterable by humans.
